q4.question: In order to make his company more efficient, Jonathan decided to merge two departments which have been doing similar work. Jonathan must, however, ensure that he make all the necessary people-oriented changes in order to get his employees from both teams to work effectively together. What would you recommend that Jonathan does to help create stability with his employees from the two departments he plans to merge?
options: He is the boss so he should do what he believes should work in the company's best interest
He should talk to his sister company about bringing his workers on
He should move the current employees to other departments and hire a new set of employees
He should offer to organize some team building meetings
q4.answer: He should offer to organize some team building meetings
